Name: Lust Epidemic
About the game: A student of East State University named Brad finds himself stranded at rival college Saint Dame University during a hurricane that has unexpectedly changed course and struck the town. While exploring the ancient and creepy campus grounds you'll uncover many mysteries and secrets... as well as some sexy fun! In Lust Epidemic you will navigate around the campus and find items and clues that will unfold a mystery as you problem solve your way through the game and build your relationships with the woman you find yourself trapped with.
